channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🔴 00:09 Air alert in Cherkasy region. Follow for further updates.
item.description: 🔴 00:09 Air alert in Cherkasy region. Follow for further updates. #Cherkasy_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 22:17 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now in Chervonogrigorivska territorial community. Take shelter!
